Other Methods

– getTestValue:defaultContent:updateType:parameters:

  • @brief Processes a Target service request to return the experience value.
  • @param name a string pointer containing the name of the mbox
  • @param defaultValue a string pointer containing the content to be returned on failure
  • @param updateType of test name it can be always appstart or appupdate
  • @param parameters a dictionary of key-value pairs that will be added to the request.
  • @return experience value for the testName.
- (nullable NSString *)getTestValue:(nullable NSString *)testName defaultContent:(nullable NSString *)defaultValue updateType:(AIABTestUpdateType)updateType parameters:(nullable NSDictionary *)parameters

AIABTestProtocol.h

– initWithAppInfra:

- (nullable instancetype)initWithAppInfra:(nonnull AIAppInfra *)appInfra

Other Methods

– getCacheStatus

Returns the status of the cached experiences for the configured list of tests. At initialization of the module, the status is either NoTestsDefined, NoCachedExperiences, or ExperiencesNotUpdated. An updateCache may change the state to ExperiencesPartiallyUpdated or ExperiencesUpdated.

- (AIABTestCacheStatus)getCacheStatus

Return Value

status of the experience cache.

Declared In

AIABTestProtocol.h

– appRestarted

- (void)appRestarted

– updateCacheWithSuccess:error:

Download experience values from the server. Call will have no effect if state equals NO_TESTS_DEFINED or EXPERIENCES_UPDATED and return onSuccess.

- (void)updateCacheWithSuccess:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( ))success error:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( NSError *_Nullable ))error

Parameters

success

and error callback blocks. success bock will be called once all experiences that is specified in the appconfig file was updated
